input.sentences: many showed off their dance moves .
some preferred to watch from the sidelines because they were n't as confident .
a lot of people had chose interesting styles for this special night .
it was 10 pm and the dj was busy spinning tunes for everyone at the club .
everyone waited for the ball to drop | ready to party like it was 2012 !
output.sentences: I'm so glad I went to Party City for supplies, Angel loved her new confetti halo!
Shelia, ever the queen, watched the paper explosion on Angela with disgust. Her husband, Tim, kissed their friend, Zeke, behind her back.
As I said hi to John, he strutted like a peacock showing off his cool shirt. His new acquaintance, Delilah, was mighty impressed.
Ricco rocked the house as he spun is jammin' mix.
It's 3 A.M. Everyone's plastered and it's time to go home!
